insights.title: Understanding Anxiety
insights.summary: Anxiety is a natural response to stress, but when it becomes overwhelming, it can interfere with daily life.
insights.author: Ride Your Demons

insights.title: The Science of Breathing
insights.summary: Deep breathing activates the parasympathetic nervous system, helping to calm the body's stress response.
insights.author: Ride Your Demons

insights.title: Building Resilience
insights.summary: Resilience is the ability to bounce back from adversity. It's a skill that can be developed over time.
insights.author: Ride Your Demons

insights.title: Mindfulness Basics
insights.summary: Mindfulness is the practice of paying attention to the present moment without judgment.
insights.author: Ride Your Demons

insights.title: Sleep and Mental Health
insights.summary: Quality sleep is essential for emotional regulation and cognitive function.
insights.author: Ride Your Demons
